steps.description: Talk to Einris Brightspear and train your class spells
Talk to Karrina Mekenda and train your pet spells
Talk to Billibub Cogspinner. Buy a Bronze Tube

tips.text: This is a limited supply item. Skip this step if Billibub Cogspinner doesn't have one

steps.description: Talk to Furen Longbeard and turn in Stormpike's Order
Talk to Shoni the Shilent and Wilder Thistlenettle. Accept Underground Assault, Oh Brother..., and Collecting Memories
Talk to Frederick Stover. Buy a Heavy Recurve Bow
Talk to Frederick Stover. Buy a Heavy Recurve Bow or something better from the Auction House
Talk to Frederick Stover. Buy Sharp Arrows
Equip the Heavy Recurve Bow
Travel to the Mage Tower
Talk to Elsharin and train your class spells
Travel to the Stormwind Cathedral
Talk to Arthur the Faithful and train your class spells
Talk to Brother Joshua and train your class spells
Talk to Ardwyn Cailen. Buy a Burning Wand if it's an upgrade

tips.text: It's important to buy a non-shadow damage wand. You'll have to deal with mobs resistant to shadow damage later

steps.description: Travel to The Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Ursula Deline and train your class spells
Talk to Osborne and train your class spells
Talk to Wu Shen or Ilsa Corbin and train your class spells
Talk to Sheldras Moontree and train your class spells
Talk to Woo Ping and train weapon skills
Talk to Marda Weller. Buy a Longsword and Kris. Equip the Longsword in your Mainhand and Kris in your Offhand

tips.text: Equip the Longsword in your Mainhand and Kris in your Offhand

steps.description: Talk to Auctioneer Jaxon. Buy items from the Auction House for faster turn ins at Redridge Mountains: Great Goretusk Snout, Tough Condor Meat, Crisp Spider Meat, Rethban Ore

tips.text: This will save you time as you won't need to run around looking for mobs to kill. Skip this step if you wish to not buy any

steps.description: Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Redridge
Exit Stormwind
Travel to Redridge Mountains
Talk to Guard Parker and accept Encroaching Gnolls
Talk to Deputy Feldon and turn in Encroaching Gnolls. Accept Assessing the Threat
Talk to Foreman Oslow and accept The Lost Tools
Talk to Verner Osgood and accept The Price of Shoes
Talk to Magistrate Solomon and accept Messenger to Stormwind
Talk to Darcy and accept A Free Lunch.

tips.text: Darcy walks around inside the Inn

steps.description: Talk to Wiley the Black upstairs. Turn in The Defias Brotherhood and accept The Defias Brotherhood
Exit the Inn. Talk to Chef Breanna and accept Redridge Goulash
Talk to Shawn and accept Hilary's Necklace
Jump into the Lake. Open the Glinting Mud. Loot it for Hilary's Necklace

tips.text: It has multiple spawn locations in the Lake

steps.description: Talk to Hilary and turn in Hilary's Necklace
Talk to Ariena Stormfeather and fly to Westfall
Talk to Gryan Stoutmantle. Turn in The Defias Brotherhood and accept The Defias Brotherhood
Talk to Thor and fly to Stormwind City
Talk to General Marcus Jonathan. Turn in Messenger to Stormwind and accept Messenger to Stormwind
Enter the SI:7 Headquarters. Travel up stairs toward Master Mathias Shaw
Talk to Master Mathias Shaw. Turn in The Defias Brotherhood and accept The Defias Brotherhood
Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Westfall
Talk to Gryan Stoutmantle. Turn in The Defias Brotherhood and accept The Defias Brotherhood
Travel to Moonbrook
Kill the Defias Messenger. Loot him for his Mysterious Message

tips.text: The Defias Messenger spawns in Moonbrook. He walks along the road north of Moonbrook, to the Gold Coast Quarry and Jangolode Mine. If you don't see him along the road, wait for him to spawn in Moonbrook
He has a 4-5 minute respawn timer

steps.description: Travel to the Westfall Lighthouse
Talk to Captain Grayson and accept The Coastal Menace and Keeper of the Flame
Talk to Captain Grayson and turn in Keeper of the Flame
Kill Old Murk-Eye. Loot him for his Scale

tips.text: Old Murk-Eye patrols up and down the Longshore. If you don't see him along the Longshore, wait for him to spawn in the most southern Murloc camp

steps.description: Talk to Captain Grayson and turn in The Coastal Menace
Abandon Keeper of the Flame
Talk to Gryan Stoutmantle and turn in The Defias Brotherhood
Talk to The Defias Traitor and accept The Defias Brotherhood.

tips.text: You may need to wait for The Defias Traitor to spawn if he's not there

steps.description: Escort the The Defias Traitor to The Deadmines

tips.text: Stay beside The Defias Traitor at all times! Be ready to fight The Defias upon reaching Moonbrook

steps.description: Use Captain Sander's Treasure Map to start the quest. Accept Captain Sander's Treasure Map
Click the Captain's Footlocker and turn in Captain Sander's Treasure Map
Click the Captain's Footlocker and accept Captain Sander's Treasure Map
Click the Broken Barrel. Turn in Captain Sander's Treasure Map and accept Captain Sander's Treasure Map
Click the Old Jug. Turn in Captain Sander's Treasure Map and accept Captain Sander's Treasure Map
Click the Locked Chest and turn in Captain Sander's Treasure Map
Talk to Gryan Stoutmantle and turn in The Defias Brotherhood
Talk to Gryan Stoutmantle and Scout Riell atop the Tower. Accept The Defias Brotherhood and Red Silk Bandanas
Now you should be looking for a group to The Deadmines. Grind gnolls while assembling a Deadmines group
Travel to The Deadmines
Kill the Defias. Loot them for their Bandanas. You may complete this after you enter the Dungeon

tips.text: You may complete this after you enter the Dungeon

steps.description: Kill Skeletal Miners, Undead Dynamiters and Undead Excavators. Loot them for their Cards.

tips.text: This is completed OUTSIDE of the Dungeon

steps.description: Kill Foreman Thistlenettle. Loot him for his Badge.

tips.text: This is completed OUTSIDE of the Dungeon

steps.description: Kill Skeletal Miners, Undead Dynamiters and Undead Excavators. Loot them for their Cards.

tips.text: This is completed OUTSIDE of the Dungeon

steps.description: Enter The Deadmines Dungeon
Kill the Defias inside The Deadmines. Loot them for their Bandanas
Kill Sneed. Loot him for the Gnoam Sprecklesprocket
Kill Edwin VanCleef. Loot him for his Head and An Unsent Letter. Use An Unsent Letter to start the quest

tips.text: Use An Unsent Letter to start the quest

steps.description: Travel to Sentinel Hill
Talk to Gryan Stoutmantle and Scout Riell atop the Tower. Turn in The Defias Brotherhood and Red Silk Bandanas
Talk to Thor and fly to Stormwind
Talk to Argos Nightwhisper and accept The Corruption Abroad
Talk to Brother Kristoff and accept Speaking of Fortitude.

tips.text: Skip this step if you aren't level 20 yet

steps.description: Talk to Baros Alexston. Turn in The Unsent Letter and accept Bazil Thredd
Talk to Wilder Thistlenettle and Shoni the Shilent. Turn in Oh Brother..., Collecting Memories, and Underground Assault
Talk to Brother Kristoff and accept Speaking of Fortitude.

tips.text: Skip this step if you aren't level 20 yet

steps.description: Travel toward Milton Sheaf in the Stormwind Library.

tips.text: Skip this step if you aren't level 20 yet

steps.description: Talk to Milton Sheaf. Turn in Speaking of Fortitude and accept Brother Paxton.

tips.text: Skip this step if you aren't level 20 yet

steps.description: Talk to Warden Thelwater and turn in Bazil Thredd
Talk to Thor and fly to Redridge if you are still in Westfall
Exit Stormwind. Travel to Goldshire
Talk to Smith Argus. Turn in The Price of Shoes and accept Return to Verner
Travel to the Northshire Abbey
Talk to Brother Paxton. Turn in Brother Paxton and accept Ink Supplies
Travel to the Tower of Azora. Ascend the tower. Follow the arrow for a shortcut through the mountains
Talk to Theocritus at the top and accept A Watchful Eye
Talk to Dawn Brightstar.

tips.text: Dawn Brightstar has has limited supply items such as Scrolls and Potions as well, which you should buy if available

steps.description: Travel to Redridge Mountains
Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Redridge
Talk to Guard Parker and accept Encroaching Gnolls
Talk to Guard Parker. Turn in A Free Lunch and accept Visit the Herbalist
Talk to Deputy Feldon. Turn in Encroaching Gnolls and accept Assessing the Threat
Talk to Foreman Oslow and turn in Ink Supplies
Talk to Verner Osgood. Turn in Return to Verner and accept A Baying of Gnolls and Underbelly Scales
Kill Great Goretusks. Loot them for their Great Goretusk Snouts. Kill Tarantulas. Loot them for their Crisp Spider Meat. Kill Dire Condors. Loot them for their Tough Condor Meat

tips.text: Do NOT sell any of these items until you turn the Redridge Goulash quest
Save any Chunks of Boar Meat you loot as well as you can use them to level Cooking to 50 which is required for Duskwood later

steps.description: Kill Black Dragon Whelps. Loot them for their Scales. You don't have to complete this quest now

tips.text: You don't have to complete this quest now

steps.description: Kill Redridge Mongrels and Redridge Poachers
Kill Great Goretusks. Loot them for their Great Goretusk Snouts. Kill Dire Condors. Loot them for their Tough Condor Meat

tips.text: Do NOT sell any of these items until you turn the Redridge Goulash quest
Save any Chunks of Boar Meat you loot as well as you can use them to level Cooking to 50 which is required for Duskwood later

steps.description: Kill Tarantulas. Loot them for their Crisp Spider Meat
Jump into the Lake. Be aware of the patrolling Elite Lake Thresher in the water. Open the Sunken Chest. Loot it for Oslow's Toolbox

tips.text: Jump into the Lake. Be aware of the patrolling Elite Lake Thresher in the water

steps.description: Grind until you are 3000 xp away from level 20
Travel to Lakeshire
Talk to Foreman Oslow. Turn in The Lost Tools and accept The Everstill Bridge
Talk to Verner Osgood and turn in Underbelly Scales.

tips.text: Skip this step if you have not completed Underbelly Scales yet, you will do it later

steps.description: Talk to Magistrate Solomon and turn in Messenger to Stormwind
Talk to Martie Jainrose. Turn in Visit the Herbalist and accept Delivering Daffodils
Talk to Chef Breanna and turn in Redridge Goulash
Talk to Darcy and turn in Delivering Daffodils. Darcy walks around inside the Inn

tips.text: Darcy walks around inside the Inn

steps.description: Talk to Deputy Feldon and turn in Assessing the Threat
Ensure you are level 20 before flying to Stormwind
Talk to Ariena Stormfeather and fly to Stormwind City
Travel to The Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Ursula Deline and train your class spells
Talk to Spackle Thornberry. Buy Grimoire of Torment (Rank 2)
Talk to Gakin the Darkbinder and accept Devourer of Souls
Travel to the Mage Tower
Talk to Elsharin and train your class spells
Talk to Larimaine Purdue and train Teleport: Stormwind
Talk to Sheldras Moontree and train your class spells. Train Cat Form
Talk to Marda Weller. Buy a Longsword and equip it at 21. Buy something from the Auction House if there's something cheaper/better.

tips.text: Skip this step if you have something better

steps.description: Talk to Auctioneer Jaxon. Buy the Anti-Venom for your Poisons quest later.

tips.text: This will save you time as you won't need to run around looking for mobs to kill. Skip this step if you wish to not buy it

steps.description: Talk to Marda Weller. Buy a Longsword and equip it at 21. Buy something from the Auction House if there's something cheaper/better.

tips.text: Skip this step if you have something better

steps.description: Talk to Gunther Weller. Buy a Dacian Falx if you have enough money. Equip it at 21. Buy something from the Auction House if there's something cheaper/better.

tips.text: Skip this step if you have something better

steps.description: Talk to Gunther Weller. Buy a Dacian Falx if you have enough money. Equip it at 21. Buy something from the Auction House if there's something cheaper/better.

tips.text: Skip this step if you have something better

steps.description: Talk to Argos Nightwhisper and accept The Corruption Abroad
Talk to Brother Kristoff and accept Speaking of Fortitude
Travel to the Stormwind Cathedral
Talk to Duthorian Rall. He will give you the Tome of Valor. Use the Tome of Valor to start the quest. Accept The Tome of Valor

tips.text: Use the Tome of Valor to start the quest

steps.description: Talk to Duthorian Rall and turn in The Tome of Valor
Talk to Arthur the Faithful and train your class spells
Talk to Brother Joshua and train your class spells
Travel toward Milton Sheaf in the Stormwind Library
Talk to Milton Sheaf. Turn in Speaking of Fortitude and accept Brother Paxton
Talk to Einris Brightspear and train your class spells
Talk to Osborne and train your class spells. Train Pick Lock to learn Lockpicking
Enter the SI:7 Headquarters. Travel up stairs toward Renzik The Shiv and Master Mathias Shaw
Talk to Renzik The Shiv and Master Mathias Shaw. Accept Redridge Rendezvous and Mathias and the Defias
Talk to Wu Shen or Ilsa Corbin and train your class spells
Exit Stormwind. Travel to Goldshire
Talk to Smith Argus. Turn in The Price of Shoes and accept Return to Verner
Travel to the Northshire Abbey
Talk to Brother Paxton. Turn in Brother Paxton and accept Ink Supplies
Travel to the Tower of Azora. Ascend the tower. Follow the arrow for a shortcut through the mountains
Talk to Theocritus at the top and accept A Watchful Eye
Talk to Dawn Brightstar. Dawn Brightstar has has limited supply items such as Scrolls and Potions as well, which you should buy if available

tips.text: Dawn Brightstar has has limited supply items such as Scrolls and Potions as well, which you should buy if available

steps.description: Travel to Redridge Mountains
Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Redridge if you are in Stormwind
Talk to Foreman Oslow and turn in Ink Supplies
Talk to Verner Osgood. Turn in Return to Verner and accept A Baying of Gnolls
Talk to Verner Osgood and accept Underbelly Scales
Talk to Lucius. Turn in Redridge Rendevous and accept Alther's Mill
Kill Black Dragon Whelps. Loot them for their Scales
Kill Redridge Brutes and Redridge Mystics. Loot them for their Iron Pikes and Iron Rivets
Open the Practice Lockboxes until you reach 80 in Lockpicking
Open Lucius's Lockbox. Loot it for the Token of Thievery
Kill Black Dragon Whelps. Loot them for their Scales
Level up your Cooking using the Chunks of Boar Meat you farmed earlier. You need level 50 Cooking.

tips.text: If you need more Chunks of Boar Meat travel to the west near Bellygrub and kill more Great Goretusks

steps.description: Talk to Foreman Oslow and turn in The Everstill Bridge
Talk to Verner Osgood. Turn in A Baying of Gnolls and Underbelly Scales
Talk to Verner Osgood and turn in A Baying of Gnolls
Talk to Lucius and turn in Alther's Mill
Delete the Certificate of Thievery from your bags, as it's no longer needed
Talk to Ariena Stormfeather and fly to Stormwind
Travel to Westfall
Talk to Thor and get the Westfall flight path
Talk to Ariena Stormfeather and fly to Westfall
Kill Pygmy Venom Web Spiders and Venom Web Spiders. Loot them for a Small Venom Sac and their Gooey Spider Legs

tips.text: You need a Small Venom Sac to make an Anti-Venom later to remove the Touch of Zanzil debuff later
Save the Gooey Spider Legs for later
If you have a Paladin or Druid friend you can skip this step and ask them to remove it for you later

steps.description: Pay attention to the upcoming section. Press Escape, then go into Options Controls. Check Enable Interact Key and bind the Interact with Target option to a key. Additionally, it's recommended you enable Enemy Nameplates (Default Key: V) as it allows you to see enemies behind some of the corners inside the tower
Talk to Agent Kearnen. Turn in Mathias and the Defias. Accept Klaven's Tower. You MUST do this quest your Poisons

tips.text: You MUST do this quest your Poisons

steps.description: Talk to Agent Kearnen and accept Klaven's Tower. You MUST do this quest your Poisons
Pick Pocket the Malformed Defias Drone. Loot it for the Defias Tower Key.

tips.text: You must be in Stealth to use Pick Pocket
The Malformed Defias Drone spawns at the entrance to the tower, then patrols around the outside of it
Be careful as he deals a LOT of damage. If your Stealth breaks, quickly use Sprint and run away
Click HERE for a video guide

steps.description: Equip the Curvewood Dagger for this quest if you don't already have a Dagger equipped
Collect Klaven Mortwake's Journal

tips.text: Travel up to 2nd top floor of the tower. Whilst in Stealth and the Defias Tower Sentries aren't next to you, Jump onto the chair, then onto the lamp, then onto the bookshelf on top of the waypoint location
Manually Unstealth, then press your Interact with Target keybind to open the Duskwood Chest. Loot it for Klaven Mortwake's Journal
NOTE: Your Stealth will temporarily stop working after looting Klaven Mortwake's Journal

Be prepared to run if you don't kill the Defias Tower Sentries on the 2nd floor. They will most likely aggro you permanently (but not attack you) when you are on top of the bookshelf as it is an evade spot

If you have a Dagger in your bags or equipped, you can cast Ambush on the Defias Tower Patrollers and Defias Tower Sentries inside to kill them instantly. Be prepared to run after you kill the first Defias Tower Sentry and remember you can be hit from above. This is slower, but a LOT safer
Be careful as the Malformed Defias Drone and Defias Drones can be at the entrance of the tower if you have to run out of it
Click HERE for a video guide

steps.description: Craft an Anti-Venom
Use the Anti-Venom in your bags to remove the Touch of Zanzil debuff
Cast Stoneform to remove the Touch of Zanzil debuff
Talk to Thor and fly to Stormwind
Travel toward Shaina Fuller
Talk to Shaina Fuller. Level your First Aid to 80.

tips.text: If you have a Paladin or Druid friend, ask them to remove the Touch of Zanzil for you instead

steps.description: Talk to Shaina Fuller. Train Anti-Venom.

tips.text: If you have a Paladin or Druid friend, ask them to remove the Touch of Zanzil for you instead

steps.description: Craft an Anti-Venom
Use the Anti-Venom in your bags to remove the Touch of Zanzil debuff
Enter the SI:7 Headquarters. Travel up stairs toward Master Mathias Shaw
Talk to Master Mathias Shaw and turn in Klaven's Tower.

tips.text: Remember to re-equip your main weapon if you switched to a Dagger earlier
